biotools.summary:
A database for disease/trait causal variants identified using summary statistics of genome-wide association studies.

A GWAS fine-mapping pipeline used in CAUSALdb.

CAUSALdb integrates large numbers of GWAS summary statistics and identifies credible sets of causality by uniformly processed fine-mapping

bioschemas.name: CAUSALdb
